Comments :
Van Damme plays Rudy, whose father, Oscar is an archaeologist. 
His father goes to Israel. When his father disappears, he goes to 
Israel to find him. The chief of police claims that his father never 
entered the country, but an old friend of his father&#039;s was expecting 
him and before he could say more, he is killed.  Rudy gets away, 
and returns to the police chief, who still refuses to believe that 
a crime has been committed. He then has Rudy deported, but Rudy 
convinces the police woman assigned to bring him to the airport 
not to, and help him find his father.

Director : Sheldon Lettich

Writers: Les Weldon
         Jean-Claude Van Damme
